title: Department of Education - Main Page
content:

<meta property="og:title" content="Home" />
<meta property="og:description" content="ED is America’s education agency. We help students pay for school, support families, and give educators tools to do their jobs. We protect students' rights and make sure every American has equal access to an education." />

<meta name="twitter:title" content="Home" />
